product.longDescription: Quantities of heart-shaped leaf pairs, each "wrapped" around a white-flowered stem. Can tolerate moderate frost and can be grown all winter in mild regions or in cold greenhouses. The taste of the young leaves is wild and fresh. Suitable for multiple cuttings. Also known as miner's lettuce. ﻿Avg. 46,850 seeds/oz. Packet: 500 seeds.

attributes.label: Grid Description
value: Succulent, cold-hardy salad green with heart-shaped leaf pairs.
